text: hakwa phwk khea xxk pi nı hmu phwk cea læw k mimi xari pheim kæ phwk cea nxkcak khwam seiyhay theanan læa nænxn phwk khea k yxm chwy xokas yuhæy rahwang phwk cea doy prarthna hı keid khwam wunway kæ phwk cea læa nı hmu phwk cea nan k mi phwk thi rab fang phwk khea xyu læa xallxhˌ nan pen phuthrng rxbru nı phu xthrrm thanghlay
